directions: In a bowl stir together the orange sections, the onion, the olives, the oil, the vinegar, the cumin, and salt and pepper to taste, add the romaine, and toss the salad well.
ingredients: 1 navel orange, rind and pith cut away with a serrated knife and the ;flesh sectioned
6 oil-cured black olives, pitted and cut into slivers
1 teaspoon Sherry vinegar or cider vinegar
2 cups shredded romaine, washed well and spun dry
title: Romaine with Oranges and Black Olives
